why_us.title: Why Us
why_us.text1: Lider has been on the market since 2006 and is the first such office in this region. In our business, we offer a wide selection of motor, property, life and agricultural insurance.
why_us.you_save: You Save Time With Us, Health And Money
why_us.text2: The 'LIDER ' office offers mediation in the registration of vehicles both imported from abroad and purchased in Poland together with the necessary fees in all offices.
why_us.explore: Explore a wide range of office formalities
why_us.text3: Excellent knowledge of foreign languages, careful tracking of all linguistic changes is our passion. We guarantee accurate and reliable translation, regardless of language and subject!
why_us.formalities2: We'll do all of them for your formalities and more
why_us.registration2: Check our registration price vehicle in its area

insurance.text1: All risks, i.e. insurance against all risks - AC insurance covers damage to the vehicle, its destruction or loss due to all events.
insurance.text2: The subject of insurance is the civil liability of any person who, while driving a motor vehicle during the duration of the insurance contract, caused damage in connection with the movement of that vehicle.
insurance.text3: 'Lider ' offers you the best offers on the market of known insurance companies. We guarantee the greatest professionalism and advice regarding vehicle insurance.
